content: Forex (FX) Travel Lifestyle Asked by William WangAsked on 26 Mar 2019I have a UK trip this July. With Brexit looming, when is a good time to change Singapore Dollars to British Pounds?1 answerAnswerBumped2

Yong Kah HweeLevel 6. MasterAnswered on 20 Jun 2019I don't think anyone knows... Also, if you are just going there for a short trip, it is unlikely that choosing the "right time" to change your money is going to make much difference to the amount you get in British Pounds.0 comments0
